body:
Yes, you can set Travis-CI to test CVMFS.  We are in the StashCache project, nightly.
https://travis-ci.org/StashCache/stashcache-tester

And the repo (most everything is done under the “tests” directory)
https://github.com/StashCache/stashcache-tester

-Derek

> On Sep 13, 2017, at 12:04 PM, Edgar Fajardo <notifications@github.com> wrote:
> 
> @DrDaveD I do understand that singularity can be tested without cvmfs but since that one is the OSG most common use case, I would like to test it that way. But yes I can change to the singularity out of a docker container as a last resort
> 
> —
> You are receiving this because you are subscribed to this thread.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or mute the thread.
>
